featured.text: They would carry their supplies in backpacks each weighing up to fifty pounds; it usually took at least 40 trips to get everything to the top and over the pass.

other.text: The Canadian government made gold seekers bring one year’s supplies with them so that _______.

definition.zh_def: 供應，提供所需的物品或資源。
definition.en_def: To provide or make available something that is needed or wanted.
definition.example: The company will supply the materials for the construction project.
